title: Member @amFOSS
description: I was selected as a member of team amFOSS, one of the best FOSS clubs from India. I'm an active member of the club and have been honing both my technical and non-technical skills. I've worked on multiple projects individually and in collaboration with other club members. I have also been a part of the organizing team for various events.

title: Bachelors in Artificial Intelligence
description: I am currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Aritificial Intelligence from Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham.

title: High School
description: I completed my high school year from P.S. Senior Secondary School with most of my time devoted to competitive examinations.
